itemInfo.itemDesc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Black Stone (Weapon)
item.desc: Weapons can be enhanced through Black Spirits.\n\n- Able to Enhance: Weapon, Secondary Weapon

item.name: Black Stone (Armor)
item.desc: Armor can be enhanced through Black Spirits.\n\n- Able to Enhance: Helmet, Armor, Gloves, Shoes

item.name: Dim Magical Crystal: Karma
item.desc:
Magic crystal that can be transfused with Helmet 
- Item Effect: Karma Recovery +3%
※ This magic crystal has high chance of getting shattered upon death.

- Transfusion can be performed by the dark spirit.

item.name: Wagon Registration: Flimsy Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Flimsy Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 6, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Ship License: Fishing Boat
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Fishing Boat> at the Wharf.
- Inventory Slot(s): 12, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Ship License
 1. Right-click the Ship License and move to the designated Wharf.
 2. Talk to the Ferry Crossing Keeper and select the Wharf menu.
 3. Click on the Register Ship menu and right-click on the Ship License.
 4. Enter the ship’s name and push Confirm to register the ship.
 5. Select the registered ship and click on the Find menu.
